text: The House on Trubnaya () is a 1928 Soviet silent comedy movie directed by Boris Barnet."Вестерн" получил главный приз фестиваля в Тромсё, "Нелюбовь" - без наград It stars Vera Maretskaya, Vladimir Fogel, and Yelena Tyapkina. ==Actors== * Vera Maretskaya as Parasha Pitunova - housemaid * Vladimir Fogel as Mr. Golikov - hairdresser * Yelena Tyapkina as Mrs. Golikova * Sergei Komarov as Lyadov * Anel Sudakevich as Marisha-maid == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian silent movies Category:Russian comedy movies Category:1928 comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Boris Barnet Category:Soviet silent movies Category:Soviet comedy movies
title: The House on Trubnaya
